title: AWS API Gateway IAM authorization and AWS v4 request signing
description: This pattern secures an API endpoint with AWS_IAM authorizer, allowing a public API to access it through AWS API Gateway. The process involves signing HTTP requests using IAM credentials per the AWS v4 signing process.

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This pattern demonstrates signing the HTTP request using IAM credentials and follow the AWS v4 signing process in order to grant access to the secured endpoint from a public API. AWS API Gateway facilitates all communication with the APIs. For more details refer to this pattern's documentation.
See the GitHub repo for detailed testing instructions.
